answers.text:
Any kind of document we classify, understand and connect visually textual and logical. An open System.


Template free system (no cost for new layouts)
Due to the high variability of incoming documents our system learns automatically


Scalable & language independent solution
Pay as you go, software as a service


Self building Neural Networks (no implementation cost)
With the use of existing data, SearchInk creates an understanding of your entire system and processes
Semantic Extraction

Qualitative extraction is eliminating post processing that happens with regular OCR / HTR

Content Mapping 
Data is only useful if connected with internal company system and mapped against

Domain knowledge
Contextual understanding of data due to understanding of company

Self learning
Due to MI our system learns with each case never stops learning, no errors, no vacations, no sick-days

We assist Human Workforce in processing Documents using Artificial Intelligence 
becoming faster, better and more intrinsic.
University Degree, 12 years in field of digitalisation

SearchInk is a comprehensive, customer-focused solution for automation of order management processes. It clusters documents into appropriate categories, extracts relevant data and seamlessly exports them into customer’s IT application.

SearchInk automatically captures all orders and order related documentation that enters the system, either as an email attachment, scanned a paper document or a manually uploaded file. Subsequently, it clusters them into suitable categories and extracts all the relevant data which are next exported to the corresponding IT application.
Thus, SearchInk eliminates the need for manual data entry, reduces the number of repetitive tasks by 40% and improves efficiency in your sales & logistics department. Depending on the type of a document, SearchInk can automatically approve an order, map ordered item against inventory and process corresponding invoices to the accounting department.

The more information you feed to SearchInk engine, the more the algorithm knows about your company processes. Large data pool provides good ground for a strong neural network. As a result, SearchInk is self- learning, fast adapting solution growing together with your business.
